sentences.en: A gasoline engine drives the motorboat.
sentences.cn: 汽油引擎推动汽船。

sentences.en: Certain truck gasoline tanks can rupture and burn in a collision.
sentences.cn: 某些卡车的油箱在碰撞时可能发生爆裂并起火。

sentences.en: Gasoline cuts oil and grease.
sentences.cn: 汽油溶解油脂.

sentences.en: Gasoline is a solvent liquid which removes grease spots.
sentences.cn: 汽油是一种能去掉油污的有溶解力的液体.

sentences.en: Gasoline is distilled from crude oil.
sentences.cn: 汽油是从原油中提炼出来的.

sentences.en: Gasoline, of course, must be saved in consumption.
sentences.cn: 汽油吗, 还是省着用吧.

sentences.en: I fill up the tank with gasoline about once a week.
sentences.cn: 大约每个星期我加满一箱汽油。

sentences.en: I siphoned the gasoline out of the car into a can.
sentences.cn: 我用虹吸管把汽车里的汽油抽到桶里。

sentences.en: It smelled like gasoline and flowers mixed together.
sentences.cn: “咦~~~~”难闻死了，像是汽油和花香混在一起。

sentences.en: leaded/unleaded gasoline
sentences.cn: 含铅 / 无铅汽油

sentences.en: No cars in Brazil run on pure gasoline anymore. The government requires that all vehicles run on blended fuel of about one-quarter ethanol.
sentences.cn: 如今巴西不再使用单纯靠汽油驱动的汽车，政府要求所有机动车均采用含四分之一乙醇的混合燃料。

sentences.en: Please give me some gasoline if you have any.
sentences.cn: 如果你有汽油,请给我一些.

sentences.en: The gasoline in the bottle has evaporated.
sentences.cn: 瓶里的汽油跑了.

sentences.en: The intake of gasoline was stopped by a clogged fuel line.
sentences.cn: 汽油的注入由于管道阻塞而停止了.

sentences.en: There is still some gasoline left in the tank.
sentences.cn: 油箱里还剩下一些汽油.

sentences.en: They ran short of gasoline.
sentences.cn: 他们的汽油不够了。

sentences.en: This car runs 5 miles on a gallon of gasoline.
sentences.cn: 这部汽车一加仑汽油可以行驶五英里.

sentences.en: This system traps the gasoline vapor escaping from the fuel tank and carburetor .
sentences.cn: 这个系统能收集从燃油箱和化油器泄漏出来的汽油蒸气。

sentences.en: Unleaded gasoline rose more than a penny a gallon.
sentences.cn: 无铅汽油每加仑涨了1分多。

sentences.en: We stopped at the filling station because we needed gasoline.
sentences.cn: 我们在加油站停下来,因我们需要加油.

sentences.en: What happens when food and gasoline supplies run low?
sentences.cn: 如果食物和汽油供应减少，会出现什么情况呢？

trans.tran_en: a liquid obtained from petroleum, used mainly for producing power in the engines of cars, trucks etc
